"Sprint-O-Matic": A combination of track and field events where athletes sprint through an obstacle course while carrying weights or using props to add difficulty.
"Wallball Golf": A golf-like game played on a court with walls around it, where players hit a ball through a series of holes by hitting it off the wall.
"Kiteboarding Polo": A variation of polo where players ride kites instead of horses and use their kites to propel themselves towards the opposing team's goal.
"Javelin Karaoke": A karaoke competition where participants throw javelins while singing their favorite songs.
"Gymnastics Diving": A diving event where gymnasts perform acrobatic stunts before diving into a pool.
